metadata.name: Diagrammatic Texture #1 (Pearlescence)
metadata.description:
Adapted from a topological diagram originally created to model the relationships between the fields of Software Architecture, Design, Development, and Engineering.

More generally, it is the minimal finite topological model with a non-trivial intersection, and can thus be viewed as the topological structuring element of all formal intersectionality.

Produced with PhotoMosh, Photoshop, and Premiere.
